text: 1.4 Jon 15.16, 17.24, Lom 8.28, Epe 5.27, Kol 1.22, 2 Te 2.13, 2 Ti 1.9, Jem 2.5, 1 Pi 2.20 Bɨlel bɨlel man ma alwol gɨlak ñɨn ak, God ne kɨli Klays nop chɨgɨnɨgabal agɨl, anɨgɨl gos nɨgak. Anɨgɨl nɨgek, chɨnop aglak. Ne yad nɨgen binɨb suŋtep mɨdɨl takaw ma mɨdeb yenɨgel agɨl, chɨnop anɨgɨl aglak.
